body: I needed this. I just got back from a fucked up Sailor Moon dojin and I needed something vanilla to cleanse my palate.
There's a few non popular anime or manga related doujins that I really like and this is one of them. The tengu girl is really cute and sexy.
uh.. i understand if it's a re-upload, but what's wrong in uploading an uncensored version?

thank you. some of us don't spend night and day on here all the time, and miss the fact that reuploads happen. I can't believe someone would reupload this just because its uncensored now. thanks for being on top of that.
